-- getKnldRtrvRqList 조회요청 리스트 조회 select RSST_DOC_ID as rsstDocId ,RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD as rtrvRqDocCd ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD', RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD) as rtrvRqDocNm ,DOC_NO as docNo ,RQ_DOC_NM as rqDocNm ,PGM_PATH as pgmPath ,RQ_DT as rqDt ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RQ_ID) as rqNm ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST', RQ_APPR_ST_CD) as rqApprStNm ,APPR_DT as apprDt ,dbo.fn_getUserName(APPR_ID) as apprNm ,(CASE WHEN RQ_APPR_ST_CD = 'APPR' THEN (CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(day , RQ_DT, GETDATE()) <= 15 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'N' END) as readFlag ,DOC_URL as docUrl
from iris_knld_rtrv_rq where del_yn = 'N'
and rq_doc_nm like '%${rqDocNm}%'
and sbc_nm like '%${sbcNm}%'
and RQ_ID = #{_userId}
order by rsstDocId desc

-- getKnldRtrvRqInfo select rtrv_rq.RSST_DOC_ID as rsstDocId ,rtrv_rq.RQ_DOC_NM as rqDocNm ,rtrv_rq.RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD as rtrvRqDocCd ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD', rtrv_rq.RTRV_RQ_DOC_CD) as rtrvRqDocNm ,rtrv_rq.DOC_NO as docNo ,rtrv_rq.PGM_PATH as pgmPath ,rtrv_rq.SBC_NM as sbcNm ,rtrv_rq.RQ_APPR_ST_CD as rqApprStCd ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST', rtrv_rq.RQ_APPR_ST_CD) as rqApprStNm ,rtrv_rq.RQ_DT as rqDt ,rtrv_rq.RQ_ID as rqId ,dbo.fn_getUserName(rtrv_rq.RQ_ID) as rqNm ,rtrv_rq.APPR_DT as apprDt ,rtrv_rq.APPR_ID as apprId ,rtrv_rq.APPR_SBC as apprSbc ,rtrv_rq.ATTC_FILE_ID as attcFileId ,rtrv_rq.RGST_ID as rgstId ,dbo.fn_getUserName(rtrv_rq.RGST_ID) as rgstNm ,rtrv_rq.RGST_OPS_ID as rgstOpsId ,rgst.sa_dept_name as rgstOpsNm ,rtrv_rq.DOC_URL as docUrl from iris_knld_rtrv_rq rtrv_rq, iris_sso_user rgst where rtrv_rq.rsst_doc_id = ${rsstDocId} and rtrv_rq.rgst_id = rgst.sa_user
mapper.update: -- updateApproval update iris_knld_rtrv_rq set rq_appr_st_cd = #{rqApprStCd}, appr_dt = Convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120), appr_id = #{userId}, appr_sbc = #{apprSbc}, last_mdfy_dt = getdate(), last_mdfy_id = #{userId} where rsst_doc_id = ${rsstDocId}
mapper.select: -- retrieveDeptDetail SELECT B.DEPT_CODE AS rgstOpsId ,B.DEPT_NAME AS rgstOpsNm FROM IRIS_SSO_USER A INNER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT B ON B.DEPT_CODE = A.SA_DEPT_NEW WHERE A.SA_USER = #{rgstId}
-- retrieveApprCnt 퇴사자 체크 SELECT COUNT(SA_SABUN_NEW) AS cnt FROM IRIS_SSO_USER WHERE SA_USER = #{rgstId} AND SSO_EX_FLAG = 'D'
-- retrieveApprCnt2 등록자가 없을경우 체크 SELECT COUNT(SA_SABUN_NEW) AS cnt FROM IRIS_SSO_USER WHERE SA_USER = #{rgstId}
-- retrieveApprId 퇴사자, 등록자가 없을경우 기술전략팀장 정보 조회 SELECT SA_USER AS apprId FROM IRIS_SSO_USER WHERE SA_DEPT_NEW ='58134871' AND SA_FUNC = 'FG0'
-- retrieveApprId2 pl 정보 조회 SELECT SA_USER AS apprId FROM IRIS_SSO_USER WHERE SA_USER = #{rgstId} AND SA_FUNC IN ('FO0','FG0','FB1')
